1.8 Database introspection

indexed-table

Generic function

Summary

Returns the table associated with this index.

Signature

indexed-table index => table

Arguments

index
An instance of <index>.

Values

table
An instance of <sql-table>.

Library

SQL

Module

SQL

Description

Returns the indexed table table.
OLE, COM, ActiveX and DBMS Reference - 31 MAR 2000
